statements: DELETE FROM choreography_details WHERE dance_routine = 'Cha Cha Cha';
DELETE FROM choreography_details WHERE routine_id = 5 AND formation = 'Circle';
DELETE FROM choreography_details WHERE counts > 64 AND dance_routine LIKE '%Jazz%' AND music_cue IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM music_cues WHERE routine_id = 101 AND cue_time < '2022-11-01';
DELETE FROM counts WHERE formation = 'Circle' AND beat_count > 32;
DELETE FROM DanceGroups WHERE group_name = 'Hip Hop Crew';
